articles.author: Adrienne Klasa, Christopher Grimes, Antoine Gara
articles.title: Pinault's Artémis to buy majority stake in Hollywood talent agency CAA - Financial Times
articles.description: Transaction begins new chapter for family whose holdings have largely focused on the luxury industry
articles.content: Frances billionaire Pinault family has agreed to buy a majority stake in Hollywood talent manager Creative Artists Agency from private equity firm TPG in the largest transaction ever for the familys … [+3661 chars]
